author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-South China Holdings Co ‍Expects To Record A Significant Increase In FY Profit
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - South China Holdings Co Ltd:
* ‍EXPECTS TO RECORD A SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN PROFIT FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* EXPECTS ‍ A SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN PROFIT​ FOR FY * ‍EXPECTS TO RECORD A SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN PROFIT FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO ‍ ONE-OFF GAIN ON DISPOSAL OF PROPERTIES HELD BY GROUP​
